meanings.definition: A small Australian parrot with a yellow crest and a gray body.
meanings.sent1: The cockatiels chirped happily in their cage.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of cockatiels flying in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cockatiels had a party on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as cheerful as a group of cockatiels singing.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the cockatiels brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: Many cockatiels gathered at the bird feeder.
meanings.sent2: The pet store had a sale on cockatiels.
meanings.sent3: The cockatiels on the farm formed a band.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with cockatiels, a colorful sea of feathers.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the cockatiels created a symphony in the garden.
